MY items ARE REAL!!!“SPECS or BLEMISHES” = Small dots or minuscule marks found only through CLOSE inspection or by holding the class up and looking through from arms length. These WILL not be visible while you wear the sunglasses and are not visible to anyone looking at you wearing the sunglasses. They are typically nearly impossible to photograph but are there.“SCRATCH”= Visible scratches with some length that are noticeable by simply looking at the lenses. They will be noticeable while wearing the sunglasses but only if you focus on them. Some are not in the line of sight and other are too small to bother you.. PLEASE REFER to the description above for details specific to the sunglasses you are considering.“DAMAGE”= Clear and present damage that is clearly visible on the lenses or frame.
